title: T206 Cobb Bat Off with Cycle or Tolstoi Backs
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: T206 Cobb Bat Off with Cycle or Tolstoi Backs
posts.post_content:
Will pay $4000 each for nice SGC50s. Price adjusted accordingly based on condition. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. Also, will pay $3000 for an SGC50 Old Mill.


Thanks---Jay
Have picked up a nice Old Mill--thanks Dean! Still need the Cycle and Tolstoi.
No problem Jay. Now I'm on a quest to find another nice Bat Off. Good luck on your quest. :)
No luck so far. I will raise my bid to $5000 for either a Cycle or Tolstoi in SGC40 or better.
Tolstoi down, will pay $6000 for a nice Cycle back. Come on guys, there must be someone out there who has one and needs some cash for REA.

Cycle picked up--thanks Craig! I would still like to upgrade the Tolstoi and Cycle I have, if anyone has a copy they would be willing to trade/sell. 
Now, moving on to the more esoteric, I can use nice copies with any of these backs:

Sweet Cap 350 fac 25
Sweet Cap 460 fac 25
Sweet Cap 460 fac 42
Piedmont 460 fac 42
Lenox-Black

I can also use a coupon type 3 without the overprint

Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if you can help.

Thanks--Jay
